content.text: Hey, I'm doing alright. I'm just trying to relax this weekend.
Hey, me too. My dad passed away last week and I'm trying to take some time for myself.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope you're doing okay.
Thank you. I'm trying. I've been listening to a lot of Ween, which is my dad's favorite band.
I love Ween too! What's your favorite song by them?
It's hard to choose, but I think I'd have to say "Ocean Man."
That's a great song! I love the chorus.
What are you doing this weekend to relax?
I'm going to be spending some time with my dog, reading, and just trying to take it easy.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to be doing some of the same things.
Well, I hope you have a good weekend.
